article_title: Curb smoking to curb Medicaid costs
article_text:
Bevin can show he’s serious by leading push for statewide smoke-free law

Kentucky has the nation’s highest incidence of cancer

Adults covered by Medicaid smoke at twice the rate of privately insured

article_metadata.title: Curb smoking to curb Medicaid costs | Lexington Herald-Leader

og.description: Gov. Matt Bevin has said he wants to improve health outcomes while controlling Medicaid costs — smart and urgent goals.
